headline: Minerals Technologies Expands Paper and Packaging Footprint in Asia
summary: MTX is expanding its paper and packaging business in Asia with new satellite plants, capacity growth, and another site planned for 2026.

raw.headline: Minerals Technologies Expands Paper and Packaging Footprint in Asia
raw.summary: MTX is expanding its paper and packaging business in Asia with new satellite plants, capacity growth, and another site planned for 2026.

headline: MOS Updates on Market and Issues Preliminary Q4 Sales Volumes
summary: Mosaic flags weak Q4 fertilizer demand, with phosphate shipments down 20% YoY and preliminary volumes of 1.3Mt phosphate and 2.2Mt potash.

raw.headline: MOS Updates on Market and Issues Preliminary Q4 Sales Volumes
raw.summary: Mosaic flags weak Q4 fertilizer demand, with phosphate shipments down 20% YoY and preliminary volumes of 1.3Mt phosphate and 2.2Mt potash.

headline: Albemarle Stock Falls Despite Upgrade, Rising Lithium Prices
summary: HSBC analyst Ishan Jain raised his call on the mining stock to Buy from Hold. His price target went to $200 from $117.

raw.headline: Albemarle Stock Falls Despite Upgrade, Rising Lithium Prices
raw.summary: HSBC analyst Ishan Jain raised his call on the mining stock to Buy from Hold. His price target went to $200 from $117.

headline: 3 Momentum Anomaly Stocks to Buy as Geopolitical Risks Drag Markets
summary: KSS, ALB, and AA show strong yearlong momentum despite recent dips, making them timely bets as markets whipsaw.

raw.headline: 3 Momentum Anomaly Stocks to Buy as Geopolitical Risks Drag Markets
raw.summary: KSS, ALB, and AA show strong yearlong momentum despite recent dips, making them timely bets as markets whipsaw.

headline: Mativ-Miru Collaboration Accelerates Automotive eWindow Deployment
summary: MATV deepens its partnership with an equity investment to fast-track eWindow smart glazing from validation to automotive-scale production.

raw.headline: Mativ-Miru Collaboration Accelerates Automotive eWindow Deployment
raw.summary: MATV deepens its partnership with an equity investment to fast-track eWindow smart glazing from validation to automotive-scale production.
